ProductInfo.Features:
700TVL High Resolution Cameras with IR-Cut Built-in
Recording at 960H (960x480 pixels), HDMI port for high definition display
The metal housing is designed for indoors & outdoors use
24IR LEDs allow for 65ft automatic night vision.
Receive instant email alerts when motion is detected, alarm is triggered, video loss occurs, etc.
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo Surveillance Security Camera System 8CH 960H DVR with 4 Night Vision 700TVL Weatherproof High Resolution Outdoor Surveillance Cameras Built-in IR-Cut with 1TB Hard Drive
